alert.note: Alert for Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 14 at 10:42AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: .Warm temperatures has lead to rapid snow melt, leading to river rises and high flows. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following county, Schoolcraft. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1041 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated snowmelt. This will cause small stream flooding. - Flooding concerns for the city of Manistique should be nothing to very limited. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Manistique and M-94 between Steuben and Manistique. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Find an alternate route around flooded low-water crossings, including roads and trails.
